vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.44;
son of: Raham (H7357)
§ Jorkoam = "the people empty"
a Calebite descendant of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約干 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "空無的民族"
猶大迦勒的後裔 (代上2:44)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约干 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "空无的民族"
犹大迦勒的后裔 (代上2:44)
